description: A combination technique used by Luffy and Toriko to defeat the Knock-Out Koala. This non-canon technique combines Luffy's rubber abilities with Toriko's strength.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Kugi Punch Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy and Toriko use this combination attack to defeat the Knock-Out Koala and rescue Nami and Komatsu.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the teamwork and fighting compatibility between Luffy and Toriko in this crossover special.

requirements: Requires both Luffy and Toriko to execute
